title: What can i do if someone takes my role
body:
Is this reportable? What is in my power to do if somebody takes my role?
Will this punish any offense?

replies.body:
Yes, yes it is reportable. Just report after game, perhaps a Riot Ticket IF IT MEANS THAT MUCH. Just do your best in the mean time.  You might actually be the champion of the game for being willing to move into the new role left over. Always be the champion of the game. 

{{sticker:sona-playing}}

^ This, basically.

Role-theft is a reportable offense, and generally results in a 14-day ban when it's verified, and other than reporting (and filing a Support Ticket, if you wanna go the extra mile), playing the game out as best you can is the only other thing you can do.
How do I fill a support ticket?

Go to the [Support site](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) (the link provided will take you directly to composing a ticket, but otherwise, you can scroll to the bottom of the forums and click "Support" > "Submit a Request"), choose the appropriate ticket type from the dropdown, and fill out the ticket with the required fields.

You go your assigned role.

If they steal it in game, make them suffer for it. Don't let them win over you. You go your lane. And don't waver.

Then after the game, report their ass.

> [{quoted}](name=rujitra,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xvoeTo2g,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-12-24T19:37:08.689+0000)
>
> If they steal it in game, make them suffer for it.

Hypocrite.

first you can dodge. youll take a lp loss but thats better than doing something your uncomfortable with. first take some screen shots and manually report it. there you dont have to waste your time in a 15-30 minute game. once you get all that done your 6 minute lock should be over with so you can play another.

Reportable? Yeah.
Punishable in concrete? Ehhh...
People in league are 100% assholes.  There is no point to play this game, unless riot is going to change their behavior with penalties.
You can soft int. or play crit soraka with cleanse and ignite but not heal anyone at all

Depends on the gamemode you are playing in, If its a draft game with assigned roles, this is reportable as trolling.
there nothing you can do about it in game, just play fill if you feel like winning.

calling roles in blind pick games are a courtesy, there is no "rule".
What I've always done is play the role anyway and do my best in game to make it work.
